installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script

find /mnt/server/game -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -not -name "csgo" -not -name "csgo_lv" -not -name "csgo_core" -not -name "csgo_imported" -not -name "core" -exec rm -rf {} +
find /mnt/server/game/csgo -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -not -name "maps" -exec rm -rf {} +
find /mnt/server/game/csgo/maps -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -not -name "ui" -not -name "templates" -not -name "editor" -not -name "prefabs" -exec rm -rf {} +
find /mnt/server/game/csgo/maps/editor -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -not -name "zoo" -exec rm -rf {} +
find /mnt/server/game/csgo/maps/prefabs -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -not -name "cs_italy" -not -name "cs_italy_s2" -not -name "cs_office" -not -name "de_ancient" -not -name "de_anubis" -not -name "de_dust2" -not -name "de_inferno" -not -name "de_mirage" -not -name "de_nuke" -not -name "de_vertigo" -not -name "misc" -not -name "overpass" -exec rm -rf {} +

#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc-s1 ca-certificates rsync lib32stdc++6 iproute2 wget

## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
  STEAM_USER=anonymous
  STEAM_PASS=""
  STEAM_AUTH=""
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

rsync -rv --exclude="*.vpk" /tmp/cs2_ds/* /mnt/server

# Copy css-update.sh to the target directory and set full permissions
#cp /tmp/cs2_ds/game/kitsunelab-scripts.sh /mnt/server/game/kitsunelab-scripts.sh
#chmod -R root:root /mnt/server/game/kitsunelab-scripts.sh

# Array of source directories and their corresponding target directories
declare -A dirs=(
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo"]="game/csgo"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo_lv"]="game/csgo_lv"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo_core"]="game/csgo_core"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo_imported"]="game/csgo_imported"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/core"]="game/core"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/core/maps"]="game/core/maps"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/ui"]="game/csgo/maps/ui"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/templates"]="game/csgo/maps/templates"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/editor"]="game/csgo/maps/editor"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/editor/zoo"]="game/csgo/maps/editor/zoo"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps"]="game/csgo/maps"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/prefabs/cs_italy"]="game/csgo/maps/prefabs/cs_italy"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/prefabs/cs_italy_s2"]="game/csgo/maps/prefabs/cs_italy_s2"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/prefabs/cs_office"]="game/csgo/maps/prefabs/cs_office"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/prefabs/de_ancient"]="game/csgo/maps/prefabs/de_ancient"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/prefabs/de_anubis"]="game/csgo/maps/prefabs/de_anubis"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/prefabs/de_dust2"]="game/csgo/maps/prefabs/de_dust2"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/prefabs/de_inferno"]="game/csgo/maps/prefabs/de_inferno"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/prefabs/de_mirage"]="game/csgo/maps/prefabs/de_mirage"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/prefabs/de_nuke"]="game/csgo/maps/prefabs/de_nuke"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/prefabs/de_vertigo"]="game/csgo/maps/prefabs/de_vertigo"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/prefabs/misc"]="game/csgo/maps/prefabs/misc"
  ["/tmp/cs2_ds/game/csgo/maps/prefabs/overpass"]="game/csgo/maps/prefabs/overpass"
)

# Create symbolic links for all vpk files
for src_dir in "${!dirs[@]}"; do
  target_dir="/mnt/server/${dirs[$src_dir]}"
  mkdir -p "$target_dir"
  for vpk_file in "$src_dir"/*.vpk; do
    ln -sf "$vpk_file" "$target_dir/"
  done
done

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +app_update 730 ${EXTRA_FLAGS} +quit ## other flags may be needed depending on install. looking at you cs 1.6

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## set permissions
chmod -R 750 /mnt/server/
